name: Dark Domination 3
description:
Dark Domination 3  -  Inspired by Vanish

How to play:
Find the 4 cards to escape the maze, but be careful: you're not alone!
The 'thing' is blind, so don't make too much noise or he will come to your position.
You make noise by walking, running (louder) and searching in the higlighted spots for the cards.
Also, the map is randomized! ;)

Good luck!
